headline: KKR : July 8, 2025 | Itaú Asset Management and KKR form Exclusive Strategic Partnership in Brazil to Broaden Private Market Investment Opportunities in Latin America’s Largest Market
summary: São Paulo and New York, July 8, 2025 - Itaú Asset Management, one of the largest asset managers in Brazil, and KKR, a leading global investment firm, have formed an exclusive strategic partnership...
